package.name: macOS Dynamic Wallpapers
package.shortDescription: Appearance aware wallpapers from macOS Mojave and Catalina for iOS 13. Uses WallpaperLoader by Skitty. Get it from this repo: https://skitty.xyz/repo/

descriptionlist.description: This is an package will full depictions.

You can also have
a multi-line item.
